original_text: Now Manasseh had the land of Tappuah: but Tappuah on the border of Manasseh belonged to the children of Ephraim;
korean_text: 답부아 땅은 므낫세에게 속하였으되 므낫세 경계에 있는 답부아는 에브라임 자손에게 속하였으며

sentences.original_text: Now Manasseh had the land of Tappuah
but Tappuah on the border of Manasseh
belonged to the children of Ephraim
